name: Riddle of the Sphinx Survival Kit
name_original: Riddle of the Sphinx Survival Kit
description:
Get megalithic savings with this EPIC bundle! With mummies, cobras, scarabs, and trap doors, you won't want to venture into the Great Pyramid without your ROTS Awakening survival kit.

This is your chance to unlock:
  • the full, enhanced edition of Riddle of the Sphinx™ The Awakening
  • all currently available DLCs, including:
  • ...Moonlight Exploration
  • ...Book of the Dead Ends™
  • ...Gil’s Secret Library
  • Plus, this bundle includes the ROTS Awakening Digital Soundtrack composed and performed by ROTS co-creator, Jeff Tobler
